mapper.select: SELECT AUC_REG_NUM, AUC_PROD_NM, SHORT_CONT, REG_DTIME, START_DTIME, END_DTIME, START_PRICE, QTY, MEMB_NUM, PROD_CATE_NUM, APPR_CD, AUC_TYPE_NUM FROM REG_AUC WHERE END_DTIME > SYSDATE AND APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY START_DTIME ASC

SELECT R.AUC_REG_NUM, R.AUC_PROD_NM, R.SHORT_CONT, R.REG_DTIME, R.START_DTIME, R.END_DTIME, R.START_PRICE, R.QTY, R.MEMB_NUM, R.PROD_CATE_NUM, R.APPR_CD, R.AUC_TYPE_NUM, PR.CATE_NM AS APPR_NM, AP.CATE_NM AS AUC_TYPE_NM, PC.PROD_CATE_NM AS PROD_CATE_NM FROM REG_AUC R INNER JOIN CD PR ON R.APPR_CD = PR.CD INNER JOIN CD AP ON R.AUC_TYPE_NUM = AP.CD INNER JOIN PROD_CATE PC ON R.PROD_CATE_NUM = PC.PROD_CATE_NUM WHERE MEMB_NUM = ${value}

SELECT AUC_REG_NUM, AUC_PROD_NM, SHORT_CONT, REG_DTIME, START_DTIME, END_DTIME, START_PRICE, QTY, MEMB_NUM, PROD_CATE_NUM, APPR_CD, AUC_TYPE_NUM FROM REG_AUC WHERE PROD_CATE_NUM = #{PROD_CATE_NUM} AND END_DTIME > SYSDATE AND APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY START_DTIME ASC
SELECT ATTAC_FILE_NUM, FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, REAL_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM REG_AUC_FILE WHERE AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM}
SELECT ATTAC_FILE_NUM, FILE_NM, FILE_PATH, REAL_NM, FILE_SIZE FROM REG_AUC_FILE WHERE ATTAC_FILE_NUM = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT REG_AUC_SEQ.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO REG_AUC ( AUC_REG_NUM, AUC_PROD_NM, SHORT_CONT, REG_DTIME, START_DTIME, END_DTIME, START_PRICE, QTY, MEMB_NUM, PROD_CATE_NUM, AUC_TYPE_NUM, APPR_CD ) values ( #{AUC_REG_NUM}, #{AUC_PROD_NM}, #{SHORT_CONT}, sysdate, #{START_DTIME}, #{END_DTIME}, #{START_PRICE}, #{QTY}, #{MEMB_NUM}, #{PROD_CATE_NUM}, #{AUC_TYPE_NUM}, '1500' )
mapper.update: UPDATE REG_AUC SET AUC_PROD_NM = #{AUC_PROD_NM}, SHORT_CONT = #{SHORT_CONT}, START_DTIME = #{START_DTIME}, END_DTIME = #{END_DTIME}, START_PRICE = #{START_PRICE}, QTY = #{QTY}, PROD_CATE_NUM = #{PROD_CATE_NUM}, AUC_TYPE_NUM = #{AUC_TYPE_NUM} WHERE AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM}
mapper.select: SELECT AUC_REG_NUM, REG_REJ_REAS FROM REG_REJ WHERE AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM}
SELECT CD, CATE_NM, CATE_CONT, HIGH_CD FROM CD WHERE HIGH_CD = #{HIGH_CD}

SELECT AUC_REG_NUM, AUC_PROD_NM, SHORT_CONT, REG_DTIME, START_DTIME, END_DTIME, START_PRICE, QTY, MEMB_NUM, PROD_CATE_NUM, APPR_CD, AUC_TYPE_NUM FROM REG_AUC WHERE PROD_CATE_NUM in ( SELECT PROD_CATE_NUM FROM PROD_CATE WHERE HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = #{HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM} ) AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) > END_DTIME AND APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY START_DTIME ASC

SELECT AUC_REG_NUM, AUC_PROD_NM, SHORT_CONT, REG_DTIME, START_DTIME, END_DTIME, START_PRICE, QTY, MEMB_NUM, PROD_CATE_NUM, APPR_CD, AUC_TYPE_NUM FROM REG_AUC WHERE PROD_CATE_NUM in ( SELECT PROD_CATE_NUM FROM PROD_CATE WHERE HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = #{HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM} ) AND END_DTIME > SYSDATE AND SYSDATE > START_DTIME AND APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY START_DTIME ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOT FROM REG_AUC WHERE PROD_CATE_NUM in ( SELECT PROD_CATE_NUM FROM PROD_CATE WHERE HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = (SELECT HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM FROM PROD_CATE WHERE PROD_CATE_NUM = #{PROD_CATE_NUM} ) ) AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) > END_DTIME AND APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY END_DTIME ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.AUC_REG_NUM, R.AUC_PROD_NM, R.SHORT_CONT, R.REG_DTIME, R.START_DTIME, R.END_DTIME, R.START_PRICE, R.QTY, R.MEMB_NUM, R.PROD_CATE_NUM, R.APPR_CD, R.AUC_TYPE_NUM, P.PROD_CATE_NM, PA.HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM, PA.PROD_CATE_NM AS HIGH_PROD_CATE_NM, 0 AS TOT FROM REG_AUC R INNER JOIN PROD_CATE P ON R.PROD_CATE_NUM = P.PROD_CATE_NUM INNER JOIN PROD_CATE PA ON P.HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = PA.PROD_CATE_NUM WHERE R.PROD_CATE_NUM in ( SELECT PROD_CATE_NUM FROM PROD_CATE WHERE HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = #{searchWord} ) AND END_DTIME > SYSDATE AND SYSDATE > START_DTIME AND APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY R.END_DTIME ASC ) A WHERE A.RN >= #{START} AND #{END} >= A.RN

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN, R.AUC_REG_NUM, R.AUC_PROD_NM, R.SHORT_CONT, R.REG_DTIME, R.START_DTIME, R.END_DTIME, R.START_PRICE, R.QTY, R.MEMB_NUM, R.PROD_CATE_NUM, R.APPR_CD, R.AUC_TYPE_NUM, P.PROD_CATE_NM, PA.HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM, PA.PROD_CATE_NM AS HIGH_PROD_CATE_NM, 0 AS TOT FROM REG_AUC R INNER JOIN PROD_CATE P ON R.PROD_CATE_NUM = P.PROD_CATE_NUM INNER JOIN PROD_CATE PA ON P.HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = PA.PROD_CATE_NUM WHERE R.PROD_CATE_NUM in ( SELECT PROD_CATE_NUM FROM PROD_CATE WHERE HIGH_PROD_CATE_NUM = #{searchWord} ) AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) > R.END_DTIME AND R.APPR_CD = '1501' ORDER BY R.END_DTIME ASC ) A WHERE A.RN >= #{START} AND #{END} >= A.RN

SELECT R.AUC_REG_NUM, R.AUC_PROD_NM, R.SHORT_CONT, R.REG_DTIME, R.START_DTIME, R.END_DTIME, R.START_PRICE, R.QTY, R.MEMB_NUM, R.PROD_CATE_NUM, R.APPR_CD, R.AUC_TYPE_NUM, PR.CATE_NM AS APPR_NM, AP.CATE_NM AS AUC_TYPE_NM, PC.PROD_CATE_NM AS PROD_CATE_NM FROM REG_AUC R INNER JOIN CD PR ON R.APPR_CD = PR.CD INNER JOIN CD AP ON R.AUC_TYPE_NUM = AP.CD INNER JOIN PROD_CATE PC ON R.PROD_CATE_NUM = PC.PROD_CATE_NUM WHERE R.AUC_REG_NUM = ${value}

SELECT B.BID_PRICE_REG_NUM , B.BID_PRICE , B.BID_DTIME , B.BID_NUM , U.MEMB_ID , U.MEMB_NUM FROM BIDDING B INNER JOIN REG_BIDDING R ON B.BID_NUM = R.BID_NUM INNER JOIN USR U ON R.MEMB_NUM = U.MEMB_NUM WHERE R.AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM} ORDER BY B.BID_PRICE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BIDDING (BID_PRICE_REG_NUM, BID_PRICE, BID_DTIME, BID_NUM) VALUES (BID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{BID_PRICE}, SYSDATE, #{BID_NUM})
mapper.select: SELECT BID_NUM FROM REG_BIDDING WHERE MEMB_NUM = #{MEMB_NUM} AND AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM}

SELECT MAX(BI.BID_PRICE) as BID_PRICE FROM REG_AUC RA INNER JOIN REG_BIDDING RB ON RA.AUC_REG_NUM = RB.AUC_REG_NUM INNER JOIN BIDDING BI ON RB.BID_NUM = BI.BID_NUM WHERE RA.AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM}

SELECT R.BID_NUM, R.MEMB_NUM, R.AUC_REG_NUM, R.BID_QTY, R.REG_DTIME, U.MEMB_ID, U.EMAIL || '@' || EP.CATE_NM AS EMAIL, U.MEMB_CD, AP.CATE_NM FROM REG_BIDDING R INNER JOIN USR U ON R.MEMB_NUM = U.MEMB_NUM INNER JOIN CD AP ON U.MEMB_CD = AP.CD INNER JOIN CD EP ON U.MAIL_CD = EP.CD WHERE U.CRE_DEG_CD != '1302' -- 멤버 신용 등급이 양호한 경우 AND R.AUC_REG_NUM = #{AUC_REG_NUM}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REG_BIDDING (BID_NUM, MEMB_NUM, AUC_REG_NUM, BID_QTY, REG_DTIME) VALUES (BID_REG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{MEMB_NUM}, #{AUC_REG_NUM}, #{BID_QTY}, SYSDATE)
